mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_ENTITIES (GROUP_ID, ENTITY_ID, CONTENTS) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{elementId}, #{contents})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GROUP_ENTITIES WHERE GROUP_ID=#{groupId} AND ENTITY_ID=#{elementId}
mapper.select: select GROUP_ENTITIES.*, `GROUPS`.NAME from ENTITIES, GROUP_ENTITIES, `GROUPS` where GROUP_ENTITIES.GROUP_ID = `GROUPS`.ID AND GROUP_ENTITIES.ENTITY_ID = ENTITIES.ID
select GROUP_ENTITIES.*, `GROUPS`.NAME from GROUP_ENTITIES, `GROUPS` where ENTITY_ID = #{value} AND `GROUPS`.ID = GROUP_ENTITIES.GROUP_ID
SELECT GROUP_ENTITIES.*, `GROUPS`.NAME FROM GROUP_ENTITIES, `GROUPS` WHERE ENTITY_ID = #{elementId} AND GROUP_ENTITIES.GROUP_ID = #{groupId} AND `GROUPS`.ID = GROUP_ENTITIES.GROUP_ID
